005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.impl.DefaultIndexHasKeyConstraint;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012
013/**
014 * Represents a rule that checks that a key generated for a Metaschema data
015 * object exists in a named index that was generated using an
016 * {@link IIndexConstraint}.
017 */
018public interface IIndexHasKeyConstraint extends IKeyConstraint {
019  /**
020   * The name of the index used to verify cross references.
021   *
022   * @return the index name
023   */
024  @NonNull
025  String getIndexName();
026
027  @Override
028  default <T, R> R accept(IConstraintVisitor<T, R> visitor, T state) {
029    return visitor.visitIndexHasKeyConstraint(this, state);
030  }
031
032  /**
033   * Create a new constraint builder.
034   *
035   * @param useIndex
036   *          the index name
037   * @return the builder
038   */
039  @NonNull
040  static Builder builder(@NonNull String useIndex) {
041    return new Builder(useIndex);
042  }
043
044  /**
045   * Provides a builder pattern for constructing a new
046   * {@link IIndexHasKeyConstraint}.
047   */
048  final class Builder
049      extends AbstractKeyConstraintBuilder<Builder, IIndexHasKeyConstraint> {
050    @NonNull
051    private final String indexName;
052
053    private Builder(@NonNull String useIndex) {
054      this.indexName = useIndex;
055    }
056
057    @Override
058    protected Builder getThis() {
059      return this;
060    }
061
062    @NonNull
063    private String getIndexName() {
064      return indexName;
065    }
066
067    @Override
068    protected IIndexHasKeyConstraint newInstance() {
069      return new DefaultIndexHasKeyConstraint(
070          getId(),
071          getFormalName(),
072          getDescription(),
073          ObjectUtils.notNull(getSource()),
074          getLevel(),
075          getTarget(),
076          getProperties(),
077          getIndexName(),
078          getKeyFields(),
079          getMessage(),
080          getRemarks());
081    }
082  }
083}
